content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(4.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, -60.0)

### Iron chest at position(4.5, -58.5)
Consists of following entities
- Iron chest (position 4.5, -58.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items from a furnace
-  Ensure that the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
-  Ensure that you have the item in your inventory before attempting to insert it.

### NAMESPACE
No new functions defined or variables assigned.
